version_description:
new contents.
bug fix.
bug fix

[April 5th Updates]
- New Hero Release (Aselica / Crow / Shea)
- NPC Hero Release (Veronica)
- New Costumes (School Costume Season 2)

[April 19th Update]
- King's Raid Index Update
- 2nd Academic Flair (Season 2) Costume Release

[Update]
- Arena Shop / Unique Weapon Ticket / Unique Treasure Ticket Update
- Hero Sub-story Release
- League of Honor Season Reward & Revamp
- Challenge Raid Solo Rank Mode Release

[May 31st Updates]
- New Hero Update: Shamilla / Kara / Chase
- New Costume Release: 1st Batch of Wedding Costumes
- New Substory: Viska
- Game Function Adjustments

[June 14th Updates]
- New Chapter Release: 'Chapter.8 Dragia'
- Max Hero Level Cap Release: (80 > 90)
- Guild Domain Release
- Guild Conquest Release
- 2nd Wedding Costume Release

[July 12th Updates]
- New Costume: Beach Costumes Season 2 (8 heroes)
:: Cassandra, Mediana, Scarlet, Sonia, Mirianne, Ezekiel, Crow, Chase
- 2nd Unique Treasures (Skill 2)
- Some in- game revamps

[Oct 25th Updates]
- New Hero Release: Seria
- 2nd batch of Halloween Costumes (8 heroes)
- 3 types of New Artifacts
- Additional Halloween Dungeon Release
- In-game Revamps
:: New Tutorial, Storage function, Mini game

[Nov 8th Updates]
- New Heroes Release (Lucias/Crisha)
- 1st batch of Maid & Butler Costume Release (8 Heroes)
- Global World Boss / Conquest content Release
- 3rd Unique Treasure (Skill 1) Release
- Some in- game Revamps
:: New Chat Emojis & Reforge Tutorial

[3rd September Update]
1. Loading Screen Improvements
2. Balance Update for Certain Heroes
3. 4 New Costumes
4. New Autumn Event

[25th June Update]
1. Hero Customization System
　- Customize your Heroes with various costume parts!
2. Introducing Guild War
　- Team up and wage Guild War!
3. Hero Dispatch System
4. Chapter 1~9 Difficulty Level Improvements and Integration
5. Field Raid Content
6. Main Quest System Revamp
7. 12 New Costumes

[23rd July Update]
1. Tower of Ordeals Revamp
2. New Hero (Kirze)
　> Obtain Kirze by clearing the revamped Tower of Ordeals!
3. New Challenge Raid Boss Monster - 'Kallax'
4. New Summer Event
5. 8 New Summer Costumes

[4th April Update]
1. New Hero Update (Bernheim)
2. Balance adjustments for certain Heroes
3. New Wedding March Costumes (4 types)
4. Revamping certain systems within the game

[Feb 26th Updates]
1. Chapter.9 Release (Hunting content & Scenario)
2. New Hero Release (Glenwys, Dosarta)
3. New Legendary Gear Set Release
4. New User 15 Days Attendance Board Revamp
5. New Wedding Costume Release (4 types)
6. Major Update Celebration: Attendance Event in ongoing!!

◆ Enjoy various types of events and updates in King's Raid!

[Feb 26th Updates]
1. Chapter.9 Release (Hunting content & Scenario)
2. New Hero Release (Glenwys, Dosarta)
3. New Legendary Gear Set Release
4. New User 15 Days Attendance Board Revamp
5. New Wedding Costume Release (4 types)
6. Major Update Celebration: Attendance Event in ongoing!!

◆ Enjoy various types of events and updates in King's Raid!
